amendment.description: To increase funding for the Office of National Capital Region Coordination, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 4578, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4578 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4578 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S7494-7496; text: CR S7494) To increase funding for the Office of National Capital Region Coordination, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4578 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4578 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Warner.
